verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when <S%H261>Ehud<s%> was <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2674>Hazor;<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of whose <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in Harosheth of the <S%H2800>Gentiles.<s%> <S%H1471><s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he had <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H2393>mightily<s%> <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H1683>Deborah,<s%> a <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> <S%H802><s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H3941>Lapidoth,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

And <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the palm <S%H8560>tree<s%> of <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> and <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

And she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> out of <S%H4480>Kedesh-naphtali,<s%> <S%H6943><s%> <S%H5320><s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Hath <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> saying, <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H4900>draw<s%> toward <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> and of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun?<s%>

And I will <S%H4900>draw<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2985>Jabin's<s%> <S%H6635>army,<s%> with his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and his <S%H1995>multitude;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H518>If<s%> thou wilt <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me, then I will <S%H1980>go:<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me, then I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>go.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> I will surely <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee: <S%H3808>notwithstanding<s%> <S%H57><s%> the <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1980>takest<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> for thine <S%H8597>honor;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H802>woman.<s%> And <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H1301>Barak<s%> to <S%H6943>Kedesh.<s%>

And <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> to <S%H6943>Kedesh;<s%> and he went <S%H5927>up<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet:<s%> and <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

Now <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7014>Kenite,<s%> which was of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H2246>Hobab<s%> the <S%H2859>father-in-law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> had severed <S%H6504>himself<s%> from the <S%H4480>Kenites,<s%> <S%H7017><s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H6815>Zaanaim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H854>by<s%> <S%H6943>Kedesh.<s%>
And they <S%H5046>showed<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor.<s%>

And <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> gathered <S%H2199>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> even <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him, from Harosheth of the <S%H4480>Gentiles<s%> <S%H2800><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H7028>Kishon.<s%>

And <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1301>Barak,<s%> <S%H6965>Up;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> gone <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee? So <S%H1301>Barak<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H8396>Tabor,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4264>host,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1301>Barak;<s%> so that <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> lighted <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H4818>chariot,<s%> and fled <S%H5127>away<s%> on his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

But <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4264>host,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> Harosheth of the <S%H2800>Gentiles:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and there was <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H259>man<s%> <S%H7604>left.<s%>

Howbeit <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> fled <S%H5127>away<s%> on his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H3278>Jael<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there was <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite.<s%>

And <S%H3278>Jael<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Turn <S%H5493>in,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> turn <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me; <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not.<s%> And when he had turned <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her into the <S%H168>tent,<s%> she <S%H3680>covered<s%> him with a <S%H8063>mantle.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, Give me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I am <S%H6770>thirsty.<s%> And she <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H4997>bottle<s%> of <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and gave him <S%H8248>drink,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> him.

Again he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H5975>Stand<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H518>when<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> doth <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of thee, and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3426>Is<s%> there any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6311>here?<s%> that thou shalt <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H369>No.<s%>

Then <S%H3278>Jael<s%> <S%H2268>Heber's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H3489>nail<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H7760>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H4718>hammer<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3814>softly<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, and <S%H8628>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3489>nail<s%> into his <S%H7451>temples,<s%> and <S%H6795>fastened<s%> it into the <S%H776>ground:<s%> for <S%H1931>he<s%> was fast <S%H7290>asleep<s%> and <S%H5774>weary.<s%> So he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> as <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> <S%H3278>Jael<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and I will <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1245>seekest.<s%> And when he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> her tent, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H5307>lay<s%> <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and the <S%H3489>nail<s%> was in his <S%H7451>temples.<s%>

So <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3665>subdued<s%> on <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>prospered,<s%> and <S%H1980>prevailed<s%> <S%H7186><s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> they had <S%H3772>destroyed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
